column5: Hello everyone! I was wondering if anyone could recommend a charter out of cobourg or port hope area? I have been salmon charter fishing many times but i have always travelled to the st.catherines area, but since I live in the kawartha lakes and we are going to make it a family affair this year, and there will be a couple littler ones with us and st.catherines could be a hell of a drive. We would like to go with someone who obviously can put some fish in the boat, and if you have any idea on how much it would cost or cost you it would be fantastic to know. Thanks everyone, i appreciate any advice or knowledge you would be willing to share!
You are going to hear this answer many times. Lloyd Daume...aka Fishhunter on the board.  U and Me Guide services.  Awesome service, class act, knows his stuff....nuff said!
I second that! It is always fun fishing with Lloyd (Fishhunter).
U $ ME Guide Services Lloyd Daume 905 375 0177   Twice was a happy customer
I will add my vote for Lloyd Daume at U and ME Guide Services  Great guy and works hard for his clients.
Yup!  Pasty white legs aside....Lloyd is the man!
U $ ME Guide Services Lloyd Daume 905 375 0177  always did great with him

Oh there should be lots of them out there. But my best bet would be Lloyd Daume. You can PM him here...Fishhunter.  U & ME Guide Services Lloyd Daume 905 375 0177  Keep it quiet though, we don't want too many folks to know about him.

I guess it depends on the size of your group.  Lloyd can take up to 4 I believe and you will not be disappointed.  If the group is larger call Lloyd anyways and he'll get something sorted out for you I'm sure.
Lloyd, aka fishhunter!No arguments there! Does an excelent job,and works hard for his customers.Hands down! And he does have some experience in fishing for keys as well, along the dock .
